segments.text: I've been looking for a swimming pool , but I haven't found one yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have no pool , sir , but we do have swim stations in our gym .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Swim stations ? Could you be a little more explicit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know how you run on a treadmill but don't go anywhere ? Well , it's the same thing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Gee , that's a great idea . Now , how much do I have to pay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The stations are absolutely free to guests , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! Now , when can I go down there and use the stations ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The swim stations are open daily from 7 a . m . to 10 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Boy , oh boy ! I can't wait to change into my swim trunks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be warned , sir . At certain hours the swim stations are very crowded .
segments.speaker: S2
